MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 01-DEC-2020 12:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the SY13 Broughall area of Whitchurch. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 1:40am. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the powercut has been caused by grounded overhead lines.  We are awaiting arrival of specialist lines teams and we will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:22am on 1st December 2020
